verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) The <S%H410>Mighty<s%> <S%H410>One,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> And <S%H7121>summoned<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> to its <S%H3996>setting.<s%>
Out of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> the <S%H4359>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3313>shone<s%> <S%H3313>forth.<s%>

May our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and not <S%H2790>keep<s%> <S%H2790>silence;<s%> <S%H784>Fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, And it is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H9621>tempestuous<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> Him.
He <S%H7121>summons<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> And the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H1777>judge<s%> His people: <S%H5971><s%>
<S%H622>"Gather<s%> My <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones<s%> to Me, Those who have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with Me by <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>"
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> His <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> For <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1931>Himself<s%> is <S%H8199>judge.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak;<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I will <S%H5749>testify<s%> against you; I am <S%H430>God,<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
"I do not <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you for your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> And your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> are <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> Me.
"I shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> out of your <S%H1004>house,<s%> Nor <S%H6260>male<s%> <S%H6260>goats<s%> out of your <S%H4356>folds.<s%>
"For <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%> is Mine, The <S%H929>cattle<s%> on a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2022>hills.<s%>
"I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> And <S%H2123>everything<s%> that <S%H2123>moves<s%> in the <S%H9583>field<s%> is <S%H5973>Mine.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> I were <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> I would not <S%H559>tell<s%> you; For the <S%H8398>world<s%> is Mine, and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains.<s%>
"Shall I <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H47>bulls,<s%> Or <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6260>male<s%> <S%H6260>goats<s%>?
<S%H2076>"Offer<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> a <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> And <S%H9608>pay<s%> your <S%H5088>vows<s%> to the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High;<s%>
And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> I shall <S%H2502>rescue<s%> you, and you will <S%H3513>honor<s%> Me. "

But to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> right have you to <S%H5608>tell<s%> of My <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> And to <S%H5375>take<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?
"For you <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> And you <S%H7993>cast<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> you.
<S%H518>"When<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H1590>thief,<s%> you are <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with him, And you <S%H2506>associate<s%> with <S%H5003>adulterers.<s%>
"You <S%H7971>let<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7971>loose<s%> in <S%H9567>evil,<s%> And your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H6775>frames<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
"You <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> against your <S%H251>brother;<s%> You <S%H5414>slander<s%> <S%H1848><s%> your own mother's <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H428>"These<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> and I <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>silence;<s%> You <S%H1819>thought<s%> that I was just <S%H3644>like<s%> you; I will <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you, and <S%H6186>state<s%> [the case] in <S%H6186>order<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> you who <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H433>God,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> I <S%H2963>tear<s%> [you] in pieces, and <S%H369>there<s%> be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>

"He who <S%H2076>offers<s%> a <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H3513>honors<s%> Me; And to him who <S%H7760>orders<s%> [his] <S%H1870>way<s%> [aright] I shall <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>"
